attributes.action: Get heat lamps in the smoking area of the crowborough cross wetherspoons
attributes.background: The sheltered smoking area in wetherspoons is as you can guess, pretty cold a lot. So we thought that it would easy and well apreciated if 1 or 2 heater lamps were installed with a timer system on them or something of the likes.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of Wetherspoons.
